Title: Allows an authorized organization to receive a license to hold a game of chance on Easter Sunday and Christmas Day
Summary: Allows an authorized organization to receive a license to hold a game of chance on Easter Sunday and Christmas Day; eliminates time restrictions for such games held on a Sunday.
LawCode: Amd ยง195, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to allowing an authorized organization to receive a license to hold a game of chance on Easter Sunday and Christmas Day
